title: Super Bowl Week With Dan Orlovsky, Warren Sharp, Danny Kelly, and Bryan Curtis | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 393)
description:
Robert Mays and Kevin Clark link up with Dan Orlovsky to discuss the Rams offense versus the Patriots defense (1:50), Warren Sharp on all things statistical analysis (15:50), Danny Kelly to give his keys to the matchup (29:15), and Bryan Curtis on the media buzz leading up to kickoff (43:00).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
